member.summary: Event triggered when a controller is conected.

member.name: T:Rewired.Integration.Bolt.Units.ReInput_ControllerPreDisconnectEvent
member.summary: Event triggered just before a controller is disconnected. You can use this event to save controller maps before the controller is removed.

member.name: T:Rewired.Integration.Bolt.Units.ReInput_ControllerDisconnectedEvent
member.summary: Event triggered after a controller is disconnected.

member.name: T:Rewired.Integration.Bolt.Units.ReInput_InputSourceUpdateEvent
member.summary: Event triggered before all input sources are updated. Use this event to update the element values Custom Controllers.

member.name: T:Rewired.Integration.Bolt.Units.ReInput_EditorRecompileEvent
member.summary: Event triggered when editor begins recompiling scripts.

member.name: T:Rewired.Integration.Bolt.Units.ReInput_PreShutDownEvent
member.summary: Event triggered immediately before Rewired shuts down. Rewired objects are still valid during this event.

member.name: T:Rewired.Integration.Bolt.Units.ReInput_ShutDownEvent
member.summary: Event triggered after Rewired shuts down.

member.name: T:Rewired.Integration.Bolt.Units.Player_ControllerAddedEvent
member.summary: Event triggered when a controller is assigned to this Player.

member.name: T:Rewired.Integration.Bolt.Units.Player_ControllerRemovedEvent
member.summary: Event triggered when a controller is removed from this Player.

member.summary: Event that is triggered every time the last active controller changes.

member.summary: The controller type for which to listen for changes.

member.summary: If enabled, events will be returned only when the last active controller type of the specified type changes.

member.summary: The target Player object.

member.summary: The update loop in which to monitor changes.

member.summary: The action for which to receive change events.

member.summary: The speed. This is only used for certain event types.

member.summary: The time to expire in. This is only used for certain event types.

member.name: P:Rewired.Integration.Bolt.Units.Player_InputEvent_Unified.option_usePlayerId
member.summary: If enabled, you can use the Player Id directly. Otherwise, a Player object must be linked to the Player input port.

member.name: P:Rewired.Integration.Bolt.Units.Player_InputEvent_Unified.option_useActionId
member.summary: If enabled, you can set the Action Id to be used to look up the Action. Otherwise, the Action Name will be used.

member.summary: The event type for which to send an event.
